word:
(477) MS.-97-'07.   (8T 270)     Sept. 19, '07. 
                    In Humility and Faith 


     Special instruction has been given me for God's people, for perilous times are upon us. In the world, destruction and violence are increasing. In the church, man power is gaining the ascendency, those who have been chosen to occupy positions of trust think it their prerogative to rule.
